name: Clouzy!
description:
Step into the magical world of Clouzy, and prepare to embark on an adorable adventure. Featuring many colorful creatures and locations, you’ll learn and grow alongside your companion as you care for clouds in your daycare, each with their own needs!
You’ll journey all over the map to collect new ingredients for cooking and crafting, as well as to complete quests and expand your horizons. You’re always in for a new surprise with each new area you visit.
Live your own adventure alongside your flying pet!
Explore a colorful world and all its diverse biomes!
Collect different fruits and items to cook tasty meals!
Take care of your cloud daycare by feeding and playing with them!
Complete your journal with your own adventures!
